Title: Offside
Actors: Mohammad Asarian, Sima Mobarak-Shahi, Shayesteh Irani, Ayda Sadeqi
Plot: "Offside" is about a group of Iranian girls who attempts to enter Tehran's Azadi Stadium dressed as boys in order to watch a big football match but some get caught and arrested. After the establishment of the Islamic Republic in Iran, women are not allowed to enter the stadiums.
